synopsis: A young girl must enlist her juvenile father to help save the town from her biting brother. Whilst she's trying to save the town, she must go through school life whilst hiding her brother's true form
casting: ['Lauren Grego', 'Anthony Taufa', 'Cooper Flynn', 'Karina Bracken', 'Natassija-Belle James', 'Ned Morgan', 'Keoni Davis', 'Claudia Pickering', 'Isabel Waterman']

synopsis: When the Bad Guys, a crew of criminal animals, are finally caught after years of heists and being the world’s most-wanted villains, Mr. Wolf brokers a deal to save them all from prison.
tagline: Good is no fun at all.
casting: ['Sam Rockwell', 'Marc Maron', 'Awkwafina', 'Craig Robinson', 'Anthony Ramos', 'Richard Ayoade', 'Zazie Beetz', 'Alex Borstein', 'Lilly Singh', 'Barbara Goodson', 'Dina Morrone', 'Michael Godere', 'Kelly Cooney', 'Walt Dohrn', 'David P. Smith']
